Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Oh, Commandant, here you are.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What is it?'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Sorry for bothering you... I'm just wondering if you've seen Kamui anywhere?", 4: '1'}
{2: "I haven't, sorry.", 3: '8', 4: 'I think I saw him heading that way.', 5: '9'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Oh, in that case... Thank you very much, I'll look somewhere else.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "So he's been here? Thank you very much. I'll check it out.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Don't mention it."}
{3: 'As the Strike Hawk Leader departs the corridor, a blond young man pokes his head out from a sliding door behind you.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Is he gone? Alright, alright, alright... I knew you wouldn't betray me!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "It doesn't matter! What matters is that Capt doesn't find out what I've stolen from the armory...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Take a look!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He turns around and shows you the peculiar-looking greatsword he is carrying on the back like a swordsman.'}
{2: 'This is...', 3: '24', 4: 'Star of Bethlehem?', 5: '24'}
{3: 'A greatsword inspired by the Christmas tree, it is a custom-made weapon created for Christmas last year.'}
{3: 'Its blade is in the shape of a Christmas tree, with the Star of Bethlehem attached to its point. Together the sword looks remarkably festive.'}
{3: 'However, as a special festival weapon, the most extraordinary feature of the greatsword is perhaps the fact that it "can play Christmas-appropriate music."'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'I know, right? The Weapon Department confiscated it last year after Christmas, saying a holiday weapon should only be used during a holiday...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I thought they took it because you were playing music with it in the corridor the whole night?', 3: '31'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "But it's Christmas soon! We've gotta have it with us!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Kamui leans in like a puppy begging.'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Everyone in Babylonia deserves something this awesome. Imagine everyone playing the Christmas symphony with the Star of Bethlehem on Christmas Eve at the same time...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Anyway, I'm preparing it as a surprise this Christmas Eve!", 4: '1'}
{3: "Kamui's hand slams on your shoulder so hard that you almost black out for a second."}
{2: 'But is it a good idea to steal it?', 3: '38'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Oh, Ayla said she has my back! She'll sort this out for me as soon as I'm done helping her with her Christmas Tree...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Just wait and see, Commandant! It's gonna be a super-duper perfect Christmas Eve!", 4: '1'}
{2: "Can't wait.", 3: '44', 4: "I hope you didn't just jinx it.", 5: '44'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Hehe, then I'll see you soon!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Kamui waves and heads toward the other end of the corridor.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Right, Commandant—', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He turns around after a few steps, flapping his hands.'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "In case I don't see you then—Happy Christmas Eve!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Happy Christmas Eve.'}
